thread.title: Rebecca Ashcraft
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Rebecca Ashcraft

author: Rebecca Ashcraft
title: Rebecca Ashcraft
text: The store in heath has the best staff! When i walk in Ken and all the guys know me. I have made several purchases in the last year and every one has been a great addition to my home. I currently have an item on lay away and am already thinking about my next room!
